Name: Crisp's Charging Challenge
About the game: Play as our hero, Crisp , and navigate the puzzles by using the elements of electricity, ice, and fire. Ascend the castle and complete the challenge! You'll be able to kick back and enjoy the fishing minigame! Who knows what's in those waters! You'll also be able to create your own levels, play your own custom levels, or play levels from other players through the Workshop!
